Happens after connecting to play.dakotakraft.com - I get a weird nonSpokenChat (```f f 1 0 2 4f f 4 0 9 6f f 2 0 4 83 9 2 0 0 13 9 2 0 0 23 9 2 0 0 3001fe002fe00345678fe01012ff0134ff015ff016ff0189abff017ff
```) then the error

comment_data.body:
Seems to work for me. Make sure you're on >=0.5.2 minecraft-protocol and >=0.0.2 mineflayer.
